snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter has not committed to administration proposals to send prisoners to other locations.
abstract: Pres Obama is struggling to shut down prison in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, stated imperative of his administration, and some fear task will not be accomplished before he leaves office in 2017; Defense Sec Ashton B Carter has been slowed by many of same problems that bedeviled his predecessor Chuck Hagel, including intricacies surrounding prisoner transfers.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter has not committed to administration proposals to send prisoners to other locations.

headline.main: Obama’s Plan for Guantánamo Is Seen Faltering
headline.print_headline: President’s Plan for Guantánamo Is Seen Faltering

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
